item.title: Apache CXF and Axis 2 tutorial
item.description: Apache Axis2 How to build a service Axis2 supports 3 programming model Create a service from scratch Write a class whose methods use OMElement as arguments and/or return type create a services.xml package as a .aar file deploy POJO for rpc-style services Generate the service skeleton from WSDL   实现方式 创建方式 应用文档对象模型解析(消息
